title: World Series Lance McCullers Says He Was Not Tipping Pitches in Game 3
description: Houstonâ€™s Lance McCullers Jr. set a World Series record by allowing five home runs. The Phillies hinted they were onto something but McCullers said he just pitched poorly.
dc:creator: Scott Miller
media:description: Lance McCullers Jr. of the Houston Astros allowed seven runs over four and a third innings in Game 3 on Tuesday.
